snippet.title: DO NOT PRESS THE BUTTON (To Delete The Multiverse) | Official Game Trailer | UE5
snippet.description:
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2336120/Dont_Press_The_Button_To_Delete_The_Multiverse_The_Game/

In this game you are allowed to do anything except to press that BIG RED BUTTON. Inspired by "The Stanley Parable". Coming to Steam for PC in 2024.

Estimated gameplay time: up to 1 billion years (or however long human civilization lasts).
#gaming #indiegame #pcgaming #steamnextfest #demo #gamedev #thestanleyparable 

Music credits:
1. "Krampus Workshop" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

2. "Local Forecast - Elevator" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
